    • Field Detail

      • JAKARTA_VALIDATION_MODE

        static final String JAKARTA_VALIDATION_MODE
        Indicates which form of automatic validation is in effect as per the rules defined in JPA 2 section 3.6.1.1.

        See JPA 2 sections 9.4.3 and 8.2.1.8

        See Also:
        ValidationMode, Constant Field Values

      • JAKARTA_VALIDATION_FACTORY

        static final String JAKARTA_VALIDATION_FACTORY
        Used to pass along any discovered ValidatorFactory.
        See Also:
        SessionFactoryBuilder.applyValidatorFactory(Object), Constant Field Values

      • JAKARTA_PERSIST_VALIDATION_GROUP

        static final String JAKARTA_PERSIST_VALIDATION_GROUP
        Used to coordinate with bean validators.

        See JPA 2 section 8.2.1.9

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHECK_NULLABILITY

        static final String CHECK_NULLABILITY
        Enable nullability checking, raises an exception if an attribute marked as not null is null at runtime.

        Defaults to disabled if Bean Validation is present in the classpath and annotations are used, or enabled otherwise.

        See Also:
        SessionFactoryBuilder.applyNullabilityChecking(boolean), Constant Field Values
